title: Anthracite coal imports to the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2008 - 2018 , by country
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 8 lines namely EU, Australia, China, Colombia, South Africa, Russia, USA, and Other countries. The y axis represents Import volume in thousand metric tons and the x axis represents Year.
Overall EU, and Russia are gradually increasing, China, South Africa, and USA are gradually decreasing, Australia, Colombia, and Other countries are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Throughout the period, EU generally had the highest Import volume in thousand metric tons relative to others with an average of 62.45, and it reached its maximum at 2013 with a value of 109.0.
Followed by Russia which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 25.4 Import volume in thousand metric tons,reaching its highest point  at 2018 with a value of 52.0.
The botommost line, Australia,  has a mean of 1.09, and peaked at 2010.
